document.full_text: at its developers conference in san francisco, google addressed criticism that its android operating system has not been open enough, and announced a new operating system for cellphones, tablets and tvs.
document.title: google plans to streamline android
lines_and_colors: at its developers conference in san francisco, google addressed criticism that its android operating system has not been open enough, and announced a new operating system for cellphones, tablets and tvs.
